title: Google is illegally monopolizing online advertising tech, judge rules
author: IdealeZahlen
aiHeadline: Google's online advertising monopoly is so strong, even a judge had to step in to say, 'Hey, this isn't cool anymore!'

title: TikTok is harming children at an industrial scale
author: cwwc
aiHeadline: TikTok is single-handedly turning child development into a dystopian nightmare, one algorithmically curated video at a time.

title: Gemini 2.5 Flash
author: meetpateltech
aiHeadline: Gemini 2.5 Flash: Because sometimes you just need to build things faster, even if it means your AI might accidentally invent time travel.

title: An intro to DeepSeek's distributed file system
author: sebg
aiHeadline: DeepSeek's distributed file system: Because who doesn't want their files to be spread out across the digital universe like a game of digital hide and seek?

title: “Most promising signs yet” of alien life on a planet beyond our Solar System
author: fuidani
aiHeadline: Scientists have found the most promising signs yet of alien life on a distant planet, which basically means we're one step closer to proving we're not alone—unless this is just another false alarm, in which case, humanity wins again.
